article:
Dora Hill was ten years old. Because of polio ,her entire body was covered with a plaster cast .She was41 _  on her family for everything. One night when she was asleep,she suddenly42 _ up terrified,because her bed and the whole43 _ were shaking terribly. She knew she couldn't run. Later,describing her 44 _ ,she said,"I realized that it wasn't only my bed that was shaking,but also the whole house. A horrible 45 _ filled the darkness,and I knew it was a tornado."
"Because I couldn't help myself,I46 _ loudly,'Daddy,Daddy!'Before I finished 47 _  him,he was by my 48 _ .He picked me up 49 _  and carried me to a safe place.It was a 50 . struggle for him to carry me because of the heavy51 _ *I noticed big drops of sweat on his face,but I saw something else,52 too He smiled as his eyes met mine and I knew that he loved,and I was no longer53 _ ."
She concluded,"54 _  difficulties we are facing,we should not be afraid,because we are not alone. Everything happens for a 55 reason .And when something bad or56 _ happens,we should believe that there will57 _  be something or somebody who can help us to58 get through it. We just need to hold on and 59 _ in those people we love.With the magic of60 love ,everything is going to be all right."
